name: Shawn JORDAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, S.C.I Rockview-F.J. Tennis, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Jordan v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Shawn JORDAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, S.C.I Rockview—F.J. Tennis, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of November, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 262
Shawn JORDAN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, S.C.I Rockview—F.J. Tennis, Pennsylvania State Police, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 3, 2004.
